description: Saddle stitched binding with some loose, folded leaves inserted,comic panel in blue, yellow, and pink screenprint; 24 pp.
inscription:
Upper left corner of front cover interior, purple marker: 56

front cover interior, black ink marker: 1995 / 60-102475-9

Loose leaves hand numbered in green ink

Rear cover of loose leaf packet, green ink: bad translating / and bad copy / sorry
medium: Color screenprint, xerography, black ink stamp; bound volume with loose, folded leaves inserted
title: Der Fernseher #3
